channel.title: L v W( Lumbridge Warriors VS Wildy Maniacs )
channel.description: What I was thinking was I wanted to do something special like when you create a new character you start at tutorial island and you have to click which Side you wanna choose and after you picked you go to the Castle, Place what ever I picked and you get special boots and gloves that only your Side can wear so when you try to wear it, it say's this belongs too Lumby warriors or something and you get a special cape each side and I was thinking of posting guards outside castles and what not making teleporting spots like make my troops auto attack and stuff I know this would take alot of coding but I want this to work out xD because it would be awesum and it would be a PK server except for when you try to attack your own side it wouldn't work out because it would say they're safe or something and another thing... How to add more shops and make them openable this is all I need help with ty kkthxbi. ;D

item.title: L v W( Lumbridge Warriors VS Wildy Maniacs )
item.dc:creator: @I_Eat_Java_is_Goood I_Eat_Java_is_Goood
item.description:
@I_Eat_Java_is_Goood wrote:

What I was thinking was I wanted to do something special like when you create a new character you start at tutorial island and you have to click which Side you wanna choose and after you picked you go to the Castle, Place what ever I picked and you get special boots and gloves that only your Side can wear so when you try to wear it, it say’s this belongs too Lumby warriors or something and you get a special cape each side and I was thinking of posting guards outside castles and what not making teleporting spots like make my troops auto attack and stuff I know this would take alot of coding but I want this to work out xD because it would be awesum and it would be a PK server except for when you try to attack your own side it wouldn’t work out because it would say they’re safe or something and another thing… How to add more shops and make them openable this is all I need help with ty kkthxbi. ;D
